DOC.brief_summary: Dose escalation phase 1 study of PARP inhibitor PF-01367338 in combination with chemotherapy in adult patients with advanced solid tumors
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Poly (ADP-Ribose) Polymerase Inhibitor PF-01367338 In Combination With Several Chemotherapeutic Regimens
DOC.criteria: Patients with histologically confirmed solid tumors, Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) 0 or 1 Patients with acceptable renal, hepatic, and bone marrow function Symptomatic and/or unstable brain metastases, Any cancer treatment within 4 weeks from study entry
